channel.title: Potions reduce too quickly
channel.description: When I drink a super strength potion, I go to 117 strength (How can I get it to 118?) and it stays there, until I attack a monster and it drops to 110, then 105, then 99 again. All in three hits, how can I change this?

item.title: Potions reduce too quickly
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

When I drink a super strength potion, I go to 117 strength (How can I get it to 118?) and it stays there, until I attack a monster and it drops to 110, then 105, then 99 again. All in three hits, how can I change this?
